1.0.2.en: Added meta refresh tag support and fixed an issue where in some cases page resources weren't loaded via proxy

1.0.3.en: Added proxy feature for stylesheet url() resources

1.0.5.en: Added forum topic ID to the app manifest

1.0.7.en: Update app image to remove text

1.1.1.en: Added support for dynamic script loading

1.1.2.en: Fixed URL constructor, added redirect and cookie support
